mcq.statement: Who represented the Muslim League at the Shimla Conference of 1945?

options.a: Quaid-e-Azam, Liaquat Ali Khan, and Abdurrab Nishter
options.b: Pandat Nehru, Abul Kalam Azad, and Baldu Singh
options.c: Khizar Hayat Tiwana, Liaquat Ali Khan, and Abul Kalam Azad

mcq.one_liner: At the Shimla Conference of 1945, the Muslim League was represented by **Quaid-e-Azam, Liaquat Ali Khan, and Abdurrab Nishter**.
